body_html: The problem is that kernel_shape is optional attribute, however, in Caffe2, our implementation doesnot infer from the input. Let me fix this. Also for 1d and 3d cases, I am not sure how difficult it is to add the kernel. Now I think we only support 4-D tensor.
body_text: The problem is that kernel_shape is optional attribute, however, in Caffe2, our implementation doesnot infer from the input. Let me fix this. Also for 1d and 3d cases, I am not sure how difficult it is to add the kernel. Now I think we only support 4-D tensor.
body: The problem is that kernel_shape is optional attribute, however, in Caffe2, our implementation doesnot infer from the input. Let me fix this. Also for 1d and 3d cases, I am not sure how difficult it is to add the kernel. Now I think we only support 4-D tensor.
